remarks: Lemma for ~ relogmul and ~ relogdiv .  Remark of [Cohen] p. 301 ("The proof of Property 3 is quite similar to the proof given for Property 2").  (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 25-Nov-2007.)
statement:
relogoprlem.1 $e |- ( ( ( log ` A ) e. CC /\ ( log ` B ) e. CC ) -> ( exp ` ( ( log ` A ) F ( log ` B ) ) ) = ( ( exp ` ( log ` A ) ) G ( exp ` ( log ` B ) ) ) ) $.
relogoprlem.2 $e |- ( ( ( log ` A ) e. RR /\ ( log ` B ) e. RR ) -> ( ( log ` A ) F ( log ` B ) ) e. RR ) $.
relogoprlem $p |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( log ` ( A G B ) ) = ( ( log ` A ) F ( log ` B ) ) ) $.
